title: Warm roasted root vegetable salad
ingredients: ['2 beetroots, peeled and cubed', '2 parsnips, peeled and cubed', '1 small sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', 'To serve', '75g feta or soft goat cheese', 'freshly chopped parsley, to garnish (optional)']
